name: Wel for Boobs 'em up
detailed_description:
Wel is a new personage for the game Boobs 'em up. She has sexy magnificent body. Do you think she has more chances to make a good career as a prostitute? Do you want to try how good she would be on the street?

This DLC content is available from the game, on the room where you select personages.

Born in a Singapore, Wel was very freedom loving girl who grew up in beautiful, artistic woman. Wel loves music and art, but instead of drawing pictures she decorates her body with tattoos. Now the main part of her body is covered with amazing tattoos.

Her love to music also is not usual. She is listening music always and everywhere. During her sophomore year of high school, students were doing silent work and history teacher said that they could listen to music, but if it was too loud he would “break their headphones.” so Wel was doing her work quietly with her music on low, and this obnoxious kid sitting next to her had his music really loud. Wel could hear it over her music but ignored it. Her teacher thought it was Wel. So he comes up to her & ripped her BRAND NEW Apple headphones, looking ruthless. He suddenly realized it was the guy next to Wel and he was completely embarrassed. He came in the next day with a new pair and an apology note taped to them. He couldn’t look Wel in the eye for the rest of the year. Wel still has those headphones, and even use them when is working on her new job. She is a prostitute!

Help Wel to take her place on the street!

short_description: Wel is a new personage for the game Boobs 'em up
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8 or later
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible video card with at least 512 VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.5 or later
  • Processor: Intel 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card with at least 128 VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS (or similar, Debian-based distro)
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
